spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Aerisi is a 12th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Aerisi has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Aerisi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Howling Defeat
entries: When Aerisi drops to 0 hit points, her body disappears in a howling whirlwind that disperses quickly and harmlessly. Anything she is wearing or carrying is left behind.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Aerisi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Windvane
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.
